title: 4.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Changing costumes to show two different movements of the same sprite gives you a feeling that it is moving. This is called animation. For example, take a look at the following costumes of the cat sprite. The cat seems to be moving if the costumes are played one after the other in quick succession.

Go to File and click New. Choose a bear sprite from the sprite library. Use a simple script to animate the bear into walking. Find different costumes for it from the library, draw or upload them.
